members.name: David
members.wise: There is no use whatever trying to help people who do not help themselves. You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he be willing to climb himself. -Andrew Carnegie

members.name: Julia
members.wise: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better. -Jim Rohn

members.name: Emily
members.wise: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite. – G. K. Chesterton

members.name: Ann
members.wise: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. – Thomas Edison

members.name: Paul
members.wise: Money is like gasoline during a road trip. You do not want to run out of gas on your trip, but you ‘re not doing a tour of gas stations. – Tim O’Reilly

members.name: Michael
members.wise: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen. – Wayne Huizenga
